Reviews.Title: They sent me a used camera!
Reviews.Author: DeeDee
Reviews.Content: I'm totally excited about this camera, but Willoughby's (fulfilled by Amazon) sent me a camera that has already been opened and probably used. There's fingerprint smudges all over the camera when I opened it and there were no plastic film covering the camera. I still want this camera, but I want a brand new one. Luckily, Amazon is refunding me the purchase price, but now I have to go another week before I can have my camera!

Reviews.Title: Great camera, poor camera manuel.
Reviews.Author: Leon
Reviews.Content: Camera arrived in excellent condition and the acessories were all helpful.  Only complaint is that the camera manuel was inadequate and did not contain much information on how to operate all the features of the camera.
